name: Game a Fortnight
description:
Most of these games I'm not necessarily proud of, but I did try my best. Each ZIP includes a read me with how to play each game and links to each asset that is used that isn't my own.

GAME 1

Prompt: 10 second game

Title: Assassination (finished)

Title: Vision (unfinished)

Prompt: Physics

Title: Schoolground (unfinished)
